# Orphaned processes - unexpected processes reparented to init (ppid=1)
# These indicate their parent process crashed

# /proc/1/stat - init/systemd
1 (systemd) S 0 1 1 0 -1 4194560 10000 20000 10 20 100 50 0 0 20 0 1 0 1 100000000 1000 18446744073709551615 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0

# /proc/100/stat - orphaned python worker (ppid=1, not a daemon)
# This was likely spawned by a parent that crashed
100 (python_worker) S 1 100 100 0 -1 4194304 5000 0 0 0 50 25 0 0 20 0 1 0 50000 50000000 500 18446744073709551615 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0

# /proc/200/stat - another orphaned process
200 (app_child) R 1 200 200 0 -1 4194304 3000 0 0 0 30 15 0 0 20 0 1 0 60000 80000000 2000 18446744073709551615 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0
